column1: Kata Robata////We got there just as they were making the last call for their sushi happy hour. The happy hour menu consisted of your basic sushi rolls (think Spicy Tuna
column3: etc.) but the prices were very decent ($4-$6)
column5: it enticed me. I ordered the Spicy Tuna and the Spicy Salmon rolls. Each roll consisted of 8 pieces which is an A+ in my book.
